title: Ep. #4 | TXT, EXO's CHANYEOL, and TWICE
description:
This week, Eric shares his thoughts on TXT's second single "Cat & Dog", EXO Chanyeol's solo track "찬열 '봄 여름 가을 겨울 (SSFW)”, TWICE's comeback with "Fancy", and some extra personal recs. Eric and Brian also get into an intense roommate debate. Are you Team Strawberries or Team Pumpkin? As always, if you enjoy this podcast, make sure to subscribe and leave us a comment / rating on iTunes, Spotify, Soundcloud and YouTube. It helps us tremendously :). Thank you for listening, Daebak Show family! Connect with us on Instagram, Twitter, and Facebook @daebakshow. Join our exclusive mailing list at www.daebakshow.com and be the first to know about new episodes, giveaways, special events, and other random things we have planned for you guys!
 
 See acast.com/privacy for privacy and opt-out information.
